timeline.bodyText: Please add a comment describing this class.  It seems rather complex.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps rename to StatusUrlResourceNameRule since now it's renaming off of both of those?

timeline.bodyText: A method comment here describing the algorithm would be helpful.

timeline.message: add comments to URL processing, add Status404Rule aliases to URLAsResourceNameRule

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we break out of the loop here?
timeline.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: no, unless to - i < Integer.numberOfTrailingZeros(termination), there could still be a match after this character, so we just start again and forget any partial matches so far.
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: Doh. I read this completely backwards. Reminder to self. Never review code on an empty stomach 😉
replies.author: bantonsson
